hero_image.alt: Hero image for PCBU Obligations for Maintenance Managers in Australia: The Definitive Guide to Compliance and Due Diligence

image_prompt: A photorealistic, high-quality hero image set in a modern Australian manufacturing facility. The scene features a diverse group of three professionals: a Maintenance Manager (male, 40s), a Safety Officer (female, 30s), and a Technician (male, 20s). They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses. They are standing near a large industrial conveyor system, looking confidently at the machinery, not at screens. The lighting is professional and industrial, highlighting the clean, safe nature of the environment. The image conveys authority, safety, and compliance. No text or overlays in the image.
